trans-unit.source: This tour gives you an introduction of the topbar.
The bookmark menu allows you to jump to marked backend views.
The clear cache menu allows you to clear different TYPO3 caches.

The help menu contains different helping modules.
Here you will find also the guided tours modules, where you can restart each tours and can explore many other tours.
The system information gives you some information about your installation.

The user menu contains all user related functions.
You can edit your user settings or logout from the system.

The live search enables you to search for records in the whole system.
You're also able to search for a specific record uid.
